Identified
1.Air pollution is high in haldia and khana place compared to other places<br>
2.The year 2014 and 2008 has more air pollution<br>
3.Manipur state has more air pollution<br>
4.MAPB and VRCE helps to reduce the air pollution<br>
5.Industrial area pollute more<br>
6.The pm25 is more in 30-36 frequency rate<br>
7.no2 is high in frequency level 11<br>
8.spm is highest rate is 600<br>
9.pm25 is at its peek on 36 frequency level<br>
10.so2 level is more the air pollution increases<br>
